definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Almost out of the sky, half of the moon anchors between two mountains.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎在天空外，半個月亮下錨在兩山之間。

sentences.english: Drop anchor at Great Bitter Lake for awaiting Southbound convoy and report.
sentences.chinese: 在大苦湖下錨等候南行船隊並報告。

sentences.english: When anchoring, the rode is let out to a predetermined scope.
sentences.chinese: 下錨時，錨纜被放出一個預先決定的比例。
